pages.text: The Amnesia Haze Strain$(br2)Base THC: 19% $(br)Base CBD: 6% $(br)Effect: Zombified
Amnesia Haze Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Amnesia Haze Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Amnesia Haze Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Amnesia Haze Weed in an Extractor
You can package your amnesia haze weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
